overview.summary: Travel to the United States typically requires a visa for most nationalities, with specific processes depending on your travel purpose.
notes: Citizens of Visa Waiver Program countries may qualify for ESTA for short visits.
Brazilian nationals generally require a visa interview unless renewing under interview waiver programs.
